title: Twitter's new boss
description:
Elon Musk bought Twitter. Now what? Recode's Peter Kafka explains.
Read Peter’s story: https://www.vox.com/recode/23041717/twitter-musk-business-plan-peter-kafka-column
Today’s episode was produced by Taylor Maycan, engineered by Melissa Pons (Hemlock Creek Productions) and hosted by Adan Clark Estes.
